title: Can;t recover account been years.
body:
I know for sure the email I used, and whenever I send it, I still can't recieve it. Been trying to recover it for years and I've made multiple post.

I have my accounts --, and --. Daemonhall = in game name --, and -- login = --- in game.

Can we do something to help me recover this or am I going to be ignored for years to come.

replies.body: I've edited out your account info for security.  Our account recovery team would be the only ones who could help you out here, but they'll only restore access if they're absolutely sure you're the owner.  If you fail to verify that, it's totally okay to keep trying!  Just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and they'll get back to you.  Good luck!
I've tried this before, and literally they sent me an email saying about verifying, which I replied, and then got nothing back...
